meanings.def: outside, rather than in a building
examples: The rain prevented them from eating outdoors.
The seeds may be sown outdoors in the spring.
It is often too cold to venture outdoors.
The children were encouraged to paint and draw both indoors and outdoors.

meanings.def: the countryside, away from buildings and busy places
examples: They both have a love of the outdoors.
Come to Canada and enjoy the great outdoors.
